page.title: 18Country child's day,Earlston
page.content: In the morning,I get up at about 7.00 am and then I go down stairs to have breakfast. I usually have Rice Krispies and a cup of tea. When I am ready, I go down the drive way at about 8.10am to get my bus. I get to school at about 8.20am and play football until 9.00am. At 9.00am, we come into school and work till 3.30pm. I have to wait for my bus until 3.55 pm. when secondary school finishes. When I get home, I usually have a cup of tea and a biscuit which keeps me going till tea time. I have tea at about 5.15pm and then I do my homework.After that I go to play football or watch T.V. if there is something good on.I go to bed between 10 and 10.30pm.
